original_text: And he overlaid it with pure gold within and without, and made a crown of gold to it round about.
korean_text: 순금으로 안팎을 싸고 위쪽 가장자리로 돌아가며 금 테를 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: And he overlaid it with pure gold
and made a crown of gold to it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 위해 금 관을 만들었다
